value.title: Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium

You can use Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium to take your dataset beyond 1GB and avoid failures such as timeouts. value.title: Visualization Tip   Change to Filter instead of highlight   Control the Interaction in Power BI
value.excerpt: Power BI reports are highly interactive, If you select a column in a column chart other charts will be highlighted.
